1.0.1.en: Added inlet and outlet as sensor data

1.0.2.en: Added real power measure as sensor data

1.0.4.en: Fixed login issue. Fixed missing insights on outlet temperature.

1.1.0.en: Ask for username and password, when adding device. Removed the old app settings page. Added support for multiple devices.
